name: Vitória-régia
description: A large aquatic plant known for its giant floating leaves. Symbol of the Amazon.

name: Jaborandi
description: A medicinal plant used for its healing properties, commonly found in the Amazon rainforest.

name: Castanheira-do-Brasil
description: A tall tree that produces Brazil nuts, a nutritious export product.

name: Guaraná
description: A climbing plant known for its seeds that are used to produce guaraná beverages.

name: Açaí
description: A palm tree known for its small dark fruits, used to make açaí bowls.

name: Buriti
description: A palm tree with orange fruits, used in oils and as edible fruit.

name: Copaíba
description: A tree whose oil is widely used for medicinal purposes.

name: Bromélia
description: A colorful decorative plant known for its exotic appearance.

name: Muirapiranga
description: A tree known for its hard, reddish wood, often used in construction.

name: Andiroba
description: A tree whose oil is used in cosmetics and traditional medicine.

name: Pau-rosa
description: A tree known for its fragrant wood, used in perfumes.

name: Ipê-amarelo
description: A beautiful tree with yellow flowers, often used in urban landscaping.

name: Ucuuba
description: A tree whose seeds are used to make butter for cosmetics.

name: Seringueira
description: A tree known for its latex, used in rubber production.

name: Cacau
description: The source of cocoa beans used to produce chocolate.

name: Tucumã
description: A palm tree with edible fruits rich in vitamins.

name: Apuí
description: A fast-growing plant known for covering and strangling other trees.

name: Sumaúma
description: A giant tree with a massive trunk, often referred to as the 'mother of the forest'.

name: Murici
description: A tree with small, yellow fruits used in juices and traditional cuisine.

name: Paxiúba
description: A palm tree with a flexible trunk, often used in local construction.

name: Jatobá
description: A tree with hard wood and edible fruits, known for its medicinal properties.

name: Tucupi
description: A plant used to make a traditional Amazonian sauce from its roots.

name: Cupuaçu
description: A tree known for its large, flavorful fruits, used in sweets and drinks.

name: Pupunha
description: A palm tree with edible fruits and seeds, often used in traditional dishes.

name: Urucum
description: A plant used to produce natural red dye, commonly used in food coloring.

name: Paricá
description: A large tree used in traditional medicine and for wood production.

name: Guarajuba
description: A shrub whose leaves are used for medicinal tea.

name: Jenipapo
description: A tree with fruit that is used in beverages and natural dye production.

name: Pequi
description: A tree with spiny fruits used in traditional cooking, especially in northern Brazil.

name: Ipê-roxo
description: A tree with purple flowers, often planted for decorative purposes.
